Texto: 
bilateral hilar enlargement and right paratracheal mass consistent with adenopathy.  no parenchymal pathology is noted.
sarcoid
sarcoid
lymphoma
tuberculosis
40 year old male for follow-up chest films.
the patient has a known history of sarcoid, but no prior studies were available for comparison.  the findings are classic for stage 1 sarcoid.  the others are possible, but remotely.  no parenchymal involvement is present.
